      • previousEpochBakers

        public EpochBakers.EpochBakersBuilder previousEpochBakers(BakersAndFinalizers previousEpochBakers)
        The bakers and finalizers for the previous epoch. If the current epoch is 0, then this is the same as the bakers for the current epoch.
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentEpochBakers

        public EpochBakers.EpochBakersBuilder currentEpochBakers(BakersAndFinalizers currentEpochBakers)
        The bakers and finalizers for the current epoch. If this is absent, it should be treated as the same as the bakers for the previous epoch.
        Returns:
        this.

      • nextEpochBakers

        public EpochBakers.EpochBakersBuilder nextEpochBakers(BakersAndFinalizers nextEpochBakers)
        The bakers and finalizers for the next epoch. If this is absent, it should be treated as the same as the bakers for the current epoch.
        Returns:
        this.
